N

NetworkBroadcast - Class in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
A Runnable sending a broadcast into the local network when executed.
NetworkBroadcast(NetworkEnvironment, byte[]) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkBroadcast
Creates a new NetworkBroadcast using the infos from the given NetworkEnvironment's NetworkEnvironmentSettings.
NetworkBroadcast(int, byte[], EncryptionType, byte[]) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkBroadcast
Creates a new NetworkBroadcast object.
NetworkEnvironment - Class in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
Able to find counterparts in the local network.
NetworkEnvironment(NetworkEnvironmentSettings) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironment
Creates a new NetworkEnvironment instance using the given NetworkEnvironmentSettings.
NetworkEnvironmentListener - Interface in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
A interface to be notified about events in a NetworkEnvironment object.
NetworkEnvironmentSettings - Class in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
A class containing all necessary settings for an NetworkEnvironment
NetworkEnvironmentSettings(InputStream) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettings
Creates a new NetworkEnvironmentSettings instance using the saved information in the InputStream.
NetworkEnvironmentSettings(String, DeviceType, EncryptionType, int, int, byte[]) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettings
Creates a new NetworkEnvironmentSettings instance guessing the operating system (will use 'Linux' for Android).
NetworkEnvironmentSettings(String, DeviceType, EncryptionType, int, int, byte[], String) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettings
Creates a new NetworkEnvironmentSettings instance.
NetworkEnvironmentSettingsEditor - Class in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
Allows automated editing of NetworkEnvironmentSettings objects and automatically applies the new settings.
NetworkEnvironmentSettingsEditor(NetworkEnvironmentSettings) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettingsEditor
Creates a new NetworkEnvironmentSettingsEditor for the given NetworkEnvironmentSettings
